item.content:encoded:
[vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]
Drag and Drop Interface
Simple interface to add, edit, delete and re-arrange elements. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3"]
Save Your Valuable Time
Less time fighting with your website more time for other things. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="last"]
Custom Content Ready
Theme Elements is WP 3.0+ compatible and will work with your custom content posts too. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]
Content Elements
Use professionally designed elements to enhance your website. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3"]

Use introduction videos to get started within minutes. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="last"]
Template System
With few clicks save your layouts and then re-use them in your pages. Hassle free! [/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Theme SEO
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tt_space height="10px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3" el_position="first"]

Replacement of post titles and meta descriptions

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3"]

Custom Robots Meta configuration settings

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Automatic generate keyword and description

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3" el_position="first"]

Custom SEO controls on every page and post

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3"]

SEO friendly Image customization settings

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Easy controls and detailed options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [vc_text_separator title="Title" title_align="separator_align_center" el_class="soften" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_cta_button title="Text on the button" color="btn-danger" size="wpb_regularsize" icon="none" target="_self" position="cta_align_right" show_button="hiden" call_text="Introducing Powerful Theme SEO options panel, please take a look out from Marvel Backend area. It has a lots of options that can offer you most important tracking settings" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [tt_space height="10px" el_class="haha-zai" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_tour interval="0" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_tab title="On / Off"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

SEO On/Off

If you use 3rd Party plugin to use such asAll-in-One SEO Pack,Headspace 2andWordPress SEO By Yoast. You can disable our Theme SEO feature.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Backend Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_tab] [vc_tab title="Page Title"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

SEO Page Title

You can define global title format for all wordpress elements. Single page title and Single post title custom format is also available to define by custom.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Backend Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_tab] [vc_tab title="Description Meta"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

SEO Description Meta

You can define global description meta format for all wordpress elements. Single page title and Single post title custom format is also available to define by custom.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Backend Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_tab] [vc_tab title="Indexation"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

SEO Indexation

In this feature you can choose your content is indexed, followed or nonindex, nonfollow. Be careful this section because this section is Block your content in Search Engine Sites such as Google.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Backend Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_tab] [vc_tab title="Keyword"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

SEO Keyword

Our theme keyword is really smart. If you have defined custom keyword in SEO Keyword Option area, Those keywords included automatically for each section.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Backend Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_tab] [vc_tab title="Image Optimization"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

SEO Image Optimization

This feature is very useful. Your custom defined image title and image alt are overriding for empty title, alt attributes.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_separator width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Backend Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_tab] [/vc_tour]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_column width="1/3" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Theme Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tt_space height="50px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3" el_position="first"]

General Settings

You can upload your website logo and favicon, Also you can choose you website responsive or not. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3"]

Additional Options

Here you can enable to use Facebook comment with option to display comments per page. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text el_class="service" width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Font Options

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:

1. Default table styles
Tables are automatically styled with only a few borders to ensure readability and maintain structure. With 2.0, the.tableclass is required. [/vc_column_text] [tt_table table_name="Default table" table_content="

2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
" width="2/3" el_position="last"] [/vc_column] [vc_column width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]

# First Name Last Name Username

" width="2/3" el_position="last"] [/vc_column] [vc_column width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]
4. Condensed table

# First Name Last Name Username

3 Larry the Bird @twitter
" width="2/3" el_position="last"] [/vc_column] [vc_column width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]
5. Combine them all!
Feel free to combine any of the table classes to achieve different looks by utilizing any of the available classes. [/vc_column_text] [tt_table table_name="combine_them_all" table_content="
# First Name Last Name Username

2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
" width="2/3" el_position="last"] [/vc_column]

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: sanko
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pia coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

[vc_column width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]

Drag and Drop Interface

Simple interface to add, edit, delete and re-arrange elements. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3"]

Custom Content Ready

Theme Elements is WP 3.0+ compatible and will work with your custom content posts too.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Save Your Valuable Time

Less time fighting with your website more time for other things. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="first"]

Content Elements

Use professionally designed elements to enhance your website. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3"]

Help Videos

Use introduction videos to get started within minutes. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Template System

item.title: Eat
item.dc:creator: sanko
item.content:encoded: 3 guys, 44 days, 11 countries, 18 flights, 38 thousand miles, an exploding volcano, 2 cameras and almost a terabyte of footage... all to turn 3 ambitious linear concepts based on movement, learning and food ....into 3 beautiful and hopefully compelling short films..... = a trip of a lifetime. move, eat, learn Rick Mereki : Director, producer, additional camera and editing Tim White : DOP, producer, primary editing, sound Andrew Lees : Actor, mover, groover These films were commissioned by STA Travel Australia:youtube.com/watch?v=EcOgjrRWx_Q Thanks heaps to Adam Fyfe, Brendan, Simon and Crissy at STA. All Music composed and performed by Kelsey James (kelseyanne.james@gmail.com) Soundtrack available here: itunes.apple.com/au/album/fall-to-eat-soundtrack-single/id456118539 Music Recorded and mixed by Jake Phillips Colour Grade : Edel Rafferty and Roslyn Di sisto Online Edit : Peter Mirecki Assistance in titles and production design : Lee Gingold, Jason Milden, Rohan Newman Big Ups to Michelle, Kiri, Renee, Hana, Andre, Ross, Bernie & Julie for your patience and support and awesomeness..... Huge Thanks to : Marco, Juliana and Julio at GAP Argentina and Peru Ariana Cardenas, Toni Figuera and cooltra scooters in Barcelona, Abete Zanetti Glass blowing school, Murano, Venice (abatezanetti.it) Annabel, Rosario and Carolina (Pitu) in France Juane and Andrea from the Princeca Insolenta hostel in Chile Thank you all for your kind words and encouragement. The response has been phenomenal and overwhelming. We never thought this little project would reach out to so many people. x

item.title: Walk On | Royalty Free Music - Watermarked
item.dc:creator: sanko
item.content:encoded:
A strong acoustic guitar ryhthm over a tight modern hip hop like drumbeat creates the interesting contrast that is the basis of this uplifting motivational tune. The second part features a joyful guitar melody, that later is repeated with harmonies, underlining the easy going character of the track. This modern optimistic tune is a perfect background for any project or presentation that needs an all through positive atmosphere with a unique character.
Release date: Jul 20, 2012
